title: Rarotonga staff god form and function

content.question: Which of the following statements explains the relationship between the form and the function of the staff god from Rarotonga, Cook Islands?

choices.label: It was covered in woven textiles to demonstrate the wealth of its owner.
It was painted with geometric patterns representing sacred tattoos.
It was carved with images of women to commemorate important female ancestors.
It was wrapped in layers of bark cloth to protect and assert the power of the deity.

content.answer: It was wrapped in layers of bark cloth to protect and assert the power of the deity.
